product_name: The North Face DNP Hoodie Jacket - Men's
long_description: Super lightweight and very warm, the men's DNP Hoodie from The North Face aces spring alpine missions with PrimaLoft(R) One(R) insulation and innovative hybrid construction. 60g PrimaLoft(R) One(R) insulation, quilted in the core, delivers a high warmth-to-weight ratio, dries quickly and insulates even when wet. Side and underarm panels are made of a lightweight, stretchy soft shell fabric that breathes well as you work hard, increases mobility and reduces bulk. Ripstop nylon shell fabric features a durable water repellent finish. Minimalist stretch-knit cuffs seal in warmth without bulky tabs and can be easily pushed up to vent your arms. Insulated hood lets The North Face DNP Hoodie extend your comfort zone on long climbs. Adjustable hem; zippered hand pockets. 1 hand pocket doubles as a compressible stow pouch. The North Face Summit Series(TM) apparel is designed and tested for use in harsh environments.
short_description: Super lightweight and very warm, the men's DNP Hoodie from The North Face aces spring alpine missions with PrimaLoft(R) One(R) insulation and innovative hybrid construction.
